attractions.title: Sankore Mosque
attractions.description: Historic mosque and center of Islamic learning, part of Timbuktu's UNESCO World Heritage sites.

attractions.title: Djinguereber Mosque
attractions.description: Iconic mud-brick mosque built in 1327, showcasing Sudano-Sahelian architectural style.

attractions.title: Ahmed Baba Institute
attractions.description: Modern library and research center housing ancient manuscripts and documents.

attractions.title: Timbuktu Markets
attractions.description: Vibrant traditional markets offering local crafts, spices, and cultural artifacts.

attractions.title: Sidi Yahya Mosque
attractions.description: Historic mosque named after a holy man, featuring unique Sahelian architecture.

attractions.title: Desert Tours
attractions.description: Guided tours of the Sahara Desert, experiencing traditional Tuareg culture.

attractions.title: Manuscript Museum
attractions.description: Museum showcasing ancient manuscripts and the rich literary history of Timbuktu.

attractions.title: Cultural Center
attractions.description: Modern facility hosting cultural events, exhibitions, and traditional performances.
